page.title: 10Choir fete
page.content: On 20th July the{Church Choir}held a {fete}followed by a barbecue to raise money for some new{choir robes.}Not many people stayed at the fete because it rained so much, but there were cake, jewellery, book, art and craft, plant and produce stalls, a tombola, raffle and a big bouncy castle. The cake stall raised about Â£40. The {barbecue}was very successful because it didn't rain; there was also a disco there.{Guidford Cathedral Choir}sung evensong before the barbecue, they were there as well. The fete was held in the churchyard and in the rectory garden; the barbecue was held at the school.In the middle of the fete there was a wedding as well.
